messages.body: Princess, you told me to listen to your offer.
messages.speaker: Isabel

messages.body: Call me Iracema, yes?
messages.speaker: Iracema

messages.body: I did. You are in a hurry? You don't trust me at all, do you?
messages.speaker: Iracema

messages.body: Well, if your offer sucks I kinda have to kill both of you, I think.
messages.speaker: Isabel

messages.body: Victor, leave us two.
messages.speaker: Iracema

messages.body: Victor looked at the princess, worried. After she nodded, he knew he had no choice and left.
You think... Hahaha. Tell me then. What is it that you really want?
messages.speaker: Iracema

messages.body: Why are you working with Marino?
messages.speaker: Iracema

messages.body: Because if things to according to Marino's crazy political plans, Dom Pedro IV will die.
messages.speaker: Isabel

messages.body: That's the only thing I care about, killing your daddy.
messages.speaker: Isabel

messages.body: That's it? That's all?
messages.speaker: Iracema

messages.body: You want to kill him?
messages.speaker: Iracema

messages.body: Isabel is surprised at the question.
I will help you out. You will find I can be more effective than Marino.
messages.speaker: Iracema

messages.body: But he is your father...
messages.speaker: Isabel

messages.body: You are bluffing.
messages.speaker: Isabel

messages.body: You think so...? I'll convince you.
messages.speaker: Iracema

messages.body: Iracema starts moving faster, to catch up with Victor. Isabel soon followed her.
The two girls catch up with Victor.
Glad to see you are safe, princess.
messages.speaker: Victor

messages.body: Victor, tell her who I really am.
messages.speaker: Iracema

messages.body: Victor looked at the princess for one second, and answered.
You are Princess Iracema, "the half Princess of hope". Born half-Tayra, half-Lusitani, you represent peace in Brasil.
messages.speaker: Victor

messages.body: Darn it, Victor. Tell her the truth.
messages.speaker: Iracema

messages.body: Victor does not look pleased at revealing important information, but he obeys his princess.
Iracema is an important political figure in our country, who serves as a symbolic princess to unite the two races.
messages.speaker: Victor

messages.body: So yes. I am a fake princess. Not even half-Lusitani. I am pure 100% Tayra.
messages.speaker: Iracema

messages.body: Ho... Wow.
messages.speaker: Isabel

messages.body: Isabel looks at both Iracema and Victor's face to make sure they are not lying.
I am not the King's daughter. I am his mistress.
messages.speaker: Iracema

messages.body: Princess!!! You cannot say such things in public! Or in private!
messages.speaker: Victor

messages.body: Isabel laughs and looks at Iracema from feet to head.
I see, I see... Okay, I guess I would gladly accept your help, "Princess".
messages.speaker: Isabel

messages.body: What do you want in exchange?
messages.speaker: Isabel

messages.body: How about I tell you AFTER we kill the person you want to kill
messages.speaker: Iracema

messages.body: Oh, you are confident we can kill him... Okay then.
messages.speaker: Isabel

messages.body: Iracema smiles confidently at Isabel, raising her eye brows. Victor, not knowing they want to kill the present King of Brasil, stares confusedly at both girls.
The road continues.
Ohhh, finally back.
messages.speaker: Isabel

messages.body: Victor looks at Isabel.
I don't know if I should thank you for your assistance in rescuing the princess...
messages.speaker: Victor

messages.body: Or curse you for the capturing her in the first place.
messages.speaker: Victor

messages.body: Victor, listen to me. Forget what you heard.
messages.speaker: Iracema

messages.body: Isabel did not kidnap me. She saved me. She is a hero.
messages.speaker: Iracema

messages.body: You two have become comrades and you recognize her strength.
messages.speaker: Iracema

messages.body: Are we clear?
messages.speaker: Iracema

messages.body: Yes, your grace.
messages.speaker: Victor

messages.body: She can be pretty scare, huh?
messages.speaker: Isabel

messages.body: Yes, she can...
messages.speaker: Victor

messages.body: Sorry I lied to you, Victor.
messages.speaker: Isabel

messages.body: Didn't me for you to get tangled up in Marino's gambits.
messages.speaker: Isabel

messages.body: Victor sighs.
Yes, you did lie to me. But... You have a sort of aura.
messages.speaker: Victor

messages.body: I can't help but to feel like you're actually a good person.
messages.speaker: Victor

messages.body: Victor smiles sadly and runs ahead to join the princess on the way to the castle.
Me, a good person...
messages.speaker: Isabel

messages.body: If you really believe that, your future is bleak, Victor
messages.speaker: Isabel

messages.body: Father!!
messages.speaker: Iracema

messages.body: Iracema runs off and hugs her father.
My dear daughter... How my heart flies with you coming back to me.
messages.speaker: Dom Pedro IV

messages.body: Isabel kneels in front of the trone.
You have done well, ahn...
messages.speaker: Dom Pedro IV

messages.body: You had a name, I think.
messages.speaker: Dom Pedro IV

messages.body: Isabel, your majesty.
messages.speaker: Marino

messages.body: Yes. You have done well, Isabel.
messages.speaker: Dom Pedro IV

messages.body: Name your reward.
messages.speaker: Dom Pedro IV

messages.body: Your majesty's gratitude is more than what I could ask for.
messages.speaker: Isabel

messages.body: The King scratches his beard and looks at the blue-haired child of Sahi.
Something about the way he looked made both Marino and Isabel uncomfortable.
Very well then. I will think of your reward later on. You may leave.
messages.speaker: Dom Pedro IV

messages.body: Wait...
messages.speaker: Marino

messages.body: You did well. We will talk about this tonight, yes?
messages.speaker: Marino

messages.body: Ah, yeah, maybe. I have to stop by somewhere before going home.
messages.speaker: Isabel

messages.body: Somewhere...?
messages.speaker: Marino

messages.body: Yeah. We will talk later, don't worry.
messages.speaker: Isabel

messages.body: Isabel starts whispering in Tupi-guarani language, performing a magical ritual.
A cloud of dust emerges from her magic powers.
I think I did it... Did I?
messages.speaker: Isabel

messages.body: Why, why, why. You are my new master?
messages.speaker: Saci

messages.body: Yes, I am. You are the prankster, Saci Perere, correct?
messages.speaker: Isabel

messages.body: Indeed, indeed. Indeed!
messages.speaker: Saci

messages.body: You'll obey my every order and cause no harm against me, correct?
messages.speaker: Isabel

messages.body: Saci is shorter than Isabel, but he levitates and hangs his arm in Isabel's shoulder.
I would never hurt you.
messages.speaker: Saci

messages.body: Fine then. I want you to spy on someone. Spying only, no pranks. Can you do that?
messages.speaker: Isabel

messages.body: Yes, yes. Who do I spy on, master?
messages.speaker: Saci

messages.body: if you follow the trail, you'll arrive in Petropolis, the Imperial City.
messages.speaker: Isabel

messages.body: In there, there is a palace, Palacio do Veran. In the palace, a princess.
messages.speaker: Isabel

messages.body: You will spy on the princess. Remember anything odd she does or says. Any conversations you think are important.
messages.speaker: Isabel

messages.body: Can you do that for me?
messages.speaker: Isabel

messages.body: Yes, master.
messages.speaker: Saci

messages.body: Good.
messages.speaker: Isabel

messages.body: ...What do you like, Saci? Anything you enjoy?
messages.speaker: Isabel

messages.body: Like?
messages.speaker: Saci

messages.body: Saci produces a curious black pipe.
Magic fire in the pipe, master. That, and fooling fools. No greater pleasure.
messages.speaker: Saci

messages.body: I see... Very well, then.
messages.speaker: Isabel

messages.body: Do this for me and you shall be rewarded.
messages.speaker: Isabel

messages.body: Saci gives Isabel an eerie smile and disappears into thin air
You're finally back.
messages.speaker: Marino

messages.body: Isabel smiles  and rolls her eyes
Good night to you too.
messages.speaker: Isabel

messages.body: So things went well, did they? Anything unusual happened?
messages.speaker: Marino

messages.body: Yeah, things went well. But the princess knows that it was our plan.
messages.speaker: Isabel

messages.body: She knows you captured her...? How?
messages.speaker: Marino

messages.body: I don't know. Maybe she imagined you planned the whole thing?
messages.speaker: Isabel

messages.body: Or she saw me when I moved her from the box. I don't know.
messages.speaker: Isabel

messages.body: Damn... How could you not notice if she saw you?!
messages.speaker: Marino

messages.body: Oh, shut up, Marino.
messages.speaker: Isabel

messages.body: You forgot to mention she is damn fake!
messages.speaker: Isabel

messages.body: You know...?
messages.speaker: Marino

messages.body: Yeah, no thanks to you.
messages.speaker: Isabel

messages.body: Anyways, she won't say anything. The plan should go smoothly.
messages.speaker: Isabel

messages.body: ...I see.
messages.speaker: Marino

messages.body: Marino suddenly gets silent, Isabel is surprised by that.
Sorry I didn't tell you. I didn't want to put any unnecessary elements into the plan.
messages.speaker: Marino

messages.body: It's fine... Anyways, I'm tired. Gonna go rest now.
messages.speaker: Isabel

messages.body: Isabel...
messages.speaker: Marino

messages.body: Be careful with Iracema.
messages.speaker: Marino

messages.body: She is way more dangerous than she might seem.
messages.speaker: Marino
